EmailTemplate.name: MBO Information (1350507225.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Information (1350507225.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Dave, It was a pleasure speaking with you today! I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf>.
- In addition we have a index of recorded Webinars that will cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html>.
- This is a page on our site that talks about how we help large enterprise organizations: http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>
- This is our Consulting Bill Rate Resource Guide: http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf <http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf> If you have questions, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. Good luck! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
